author: Stefan Gates
method: Put all ingredients into a saucepan, heat gently and stir occasionally for around 15 minutes (do not boil).   When hot, strain into heatproof cups (leaving the flavourings in if you want) and enjoy.
ingredients: 1 litre/35fl oz cider ,  4 tbsp honey,  1 orange, peel only,  2 cinnamon sticks,  small handful of whole cloves,  2 tsp ground allspice,  generous splash of Somerset Cider Brandy
